page.title: 16Recreation,Scremerston.
page.content: {Children's Games:}One of our favourite games is playing on a bike,playing scrambling,going through the mud and falling off without getting hurt. {BMX bikes }are great fun, especially doing wheelies. This means riding on one wheel only with the handlebars up in the air.Playing on {RollerSkates}is also good fun as you can move around very quickly. {Hidey-bo-Seek}is another game we like to play. One person is on and the rest have to hide and the one who is found has to run back to the bay without being tagged and say"free,one,two, three" and then they cannot be on. Scarper is a similar type of game. Indoors we like to play board games like {Cuckoo Nest, Packman,BMX {Challenge,}dial games like{Turbo}and {Computer Type}games like {Star Force.
